00010 using System.Web.UI.HtmlControls;
00011 using PMT.Controls;
00012 using PMTComponents;
00013 using PMTDataProvider;
00014 
00015 namespace PMT.AllUsers
00016 {
00017     public class Profile : Page
00018     {
00019         protected Button SubmitButton;
00020         protected Label StatusLabel;
00021         protected ProfileControl ProfileControl1;
00022 
00023         private void Page_Load(object sender, System.EventArgs e)
00024         {
00025             // Put user code to initialize the page here
00026             if (!Page.IsPostBack)
00027             {
00028                 ProfileControl1.AllowChangeUsername = false;
00029                 ProfileControl1.AllowChangePassword = true;
00030                 ProfileControl1.AllowChangeSecurity = false;
00031 
00032                 IDataProvider conn = DataProvider.CreateInstance();
00033                 PMTUser user = conn.GetPMTUserById(Convert.ToInt32(Request.Cookies["user"]["id"]));
00034 
00035                 // fill the form with the user's information
00036                 ProfileControl1.fillForm(user);
00037             }
00038             StatusLabel.Visible = false;
00039         }
00040 
00041         #region Web Form Designer generated code
00042         override protected void OnInit(EventArgs e)
00043         {
00044             //
00045             // CODEGEN: This call is required by the ASP.NET Web Form Designer.
00046             //
00047             InitializeComponent();
00048             base.OnInit(e);
00049         }
00050         
00055         private void InitializeComponent()
00056         {    
00057             this.SubmitButton.Click += new System.EventHandler(this.SubmitButton_Click);
00058             this.Load += new System.EventHandler(this.Page_Load);
00059 
00060         }
00061         #endregion
00062 
00063         private void SubmitButton_Click(object sender, System.EventArgs e)
00064         {
00065             StatusLabel.Visible = false;
00066             if (!Page.IsValid)
00067                 return;
00068 
00069             // create a user obj, fill it from the profile control, 
00070             //  and update the database
00071             IDataProvider conn = DataProvider.CreateInstance();
00072             PMTUser user = conn.GetPMTUserById(Convert.ToInt32(Request.Cookies["user"]["id"]));
00073 
00074             ProfileControl1.fillUser(user);
00075             bool success = conn.UpdatePMTUser(user, new TransactionFailedHandler(this.TransactionFailed));
00076 
00077             if (success)
00078             {
00079                 StatusLabel.Text = "Your profile has been updated.";
00080                 StatusLabel.Visible = true;
00081             }
00082         }
00083 
00084         private void TransactionFailed(Exception ex)
00085         {
00086             StatusLabel.Text = String.Format("Update failed.  Error {0}", ex.Message);
00087             StatusLabel.ForeColor = Color.Red;
00088             StatusLabel.Visible = true;
00089         }
00090     }
00091 }
